name: BrickMassacre
description:
Suck all color into the void one brick at a time! You might as well collect as many Void Sandwiches as possible while you're at it. Just take a Brick and smash some Void into to it and BAM! You got yourself one of the most valuable resources in the universe.

Made this Solo, in about 12 hours, used GameMaker Studio 2 and Bfxr, mostly DnD, first time using GameMaker Studio 2(even though I have used GameMaker Studio with GML), and this is my first game jam. Also, I chose the Void Sandwich theme.

Controls

Move Mouse = Move Paddle

Left Click = Shoot Ball/Activate Thrusters
